changelog:
Deezloader Remix has been unmaintained for days!
It only downloads MP3s in 128kbps and can't do logins via email due to Deezer patching their APIs.

What can you do? Start using deemix-gui!

deemix-gui is a better version of Deezloader Remix that it's maintained and lets you download 320kbps MP3s and FLACs.
Only if you have a Premium or HiFi account respectively
Note that deemix-gui is designed for desktop first and doesn't have an Android port.
Check the FAQs to know what your alternatives are.

So, you need to move on. Deezloader is dead. Long live deemix!
